subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 3 - compatibility - getName() method
msgSnippet: You ve gotta subclass TestClassRunner, I think. See http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/18728 I think we had to tweak that code a bit for some
messageBody:
You've gotta subclass TestClassRunner, I think.

See

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/18728

I think we had to tweak that code a bit for some
later versions of JUnit 4, but you'll get an idea
in that msg of one approach that works.

Chris.
--
Chris Jepeway
Jewelry Television
